pme.ai.fhe.de.studybuddy.administration

Class DataBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.arch.persistence.room.RoomDatabase
      • pme.ai.fhe.de.studybuddy.administration.DataBase

  • public abstract class DataBase
extends android.arch.persistence.room.RoomDatabase
    The DataBase class represents the room database of the project. It gets a list with all entities and creates a database out of them. It also generates all the necessary daos.

      • getDatabase

        public static DataBase getDatabase(android.content.Context context)
        This method creates the database by the means of the singleton principle. It creates an instance of the DataBase if there is none existent right now. Otherwise returns the instance of the databse.
        Parameters:
        context - the context the database should be created in
        Returns:
        the room database object
